commentBody:
Gregg has probably never attended a pro game. Once you have, you agree with Trump, they are boring.

Mostly, nothing happens. Games take up to three hours, but the quarters are only fifteen minutes, that means you spend two hours watching commercials at the stadium in a seat for which you paid three hundred dollars, drinking a twelve dollar beer, wearing a eighty dollar jersey, wondering when they are going to run the next play.

Expensive and boring...
